hero.subtitle: We just launched. Asking Fate offers practical, personal guidance you can use today—built with real feedback from early users.

ai.title: Clear, AI‑assisted insights
ai.desc: Thoughtful interpretations tailored to your question

cosmic.title: Focused experience
cosmic.desc: A quiet space to read, reflect, and save what matters

personal.title: Personal by design
personal.desc: Built for everyday decisions and gentle reflection

story.title: Why we’re building this
story.p1: Asking Fate started with a simple idea: create a calm, reliable way to pause and think more clearly. No noise—just a short reading and a prompt to reflect.
story.p2: We’re keeping it small and practical, improving week by week with early users. If it helps you make one better decision, it worked.

aiSection.title: How it works
aiSection.p1: You ask a question. We draw a card and generate a concise interpretation—grounded in traditional meanings and tuned for clarity.
aiSection.p2: It’s guidance to consider, not a verdict. You stay in control of your decisions.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.p: Help people pause, reflect, and make everyday decisions with more intention. Keep it clear, calm, and actually useful.

vision.title: Our vision
vision.p: A trusted companion for thoughtful decisions — simple enough for anyone, thoughtful enough for teams, and respectful of privacy.

privacyFirst.title: Privacy first
privacyFirst.desc: Your questions and readings remain private. No selling data, ever.

clarity.title: Clarity over hype
clarity.desc: Short, plain-language interpretations you can act on today.

inclusive.title: Inclusive by default
inclusive.desc: Useful for beginners and practitioners; welcoming across backgrounds and beliefs.

pressSection.title: Press, partnerships, or questions
pressSection.desc: We’re early and open to thoughtful collaborations. Reach out for a short walkthrough or materials.

cta.title: Ready to begin?
cta.desc: We’ve just launched—join early users exploring calm, practical guidance.

Contact.title: Contact & Support
Contact.subtitle: Need help? Have questions? We're here to assist you on your mystical journey.
Contact.stillNeedHelpDescription: If you can't find what you're looking for, don't hesitate to reach out. Our support team is dedicated to helping you have the best experience with Asking Fate.

faq.howToGetStars: How do I get more stars?
faq.howToGetStarsAnswer: You can purchase stars through our billing page or earn them through special promotions. Check the pricing page for current packages.
faq.refundPolicyAnswer: We offer refunds within 7 days of purchase for unused stars. Contact us with your transaction details for assistance.
faq.dataPrivacyAnswer: Yes, all your readings and personal information are kept completely private and secure. We never share your data with third parties.
faq.readingAccuracyAnswer: Our AI-powered interpretations provide insightful guidance based on traditional tarot wisdom. Use them as a tool for reflection and personal growth.

Pricing.heroDescription: Flexible one-time packs and a simple monthly plan. Instant delivery. Cancel anytime.

Pricing.trustedTransparentDesc: Clear pricing. No hidden fees. Stars are for readings.
Pricing.secureCheckoutDesc: Payments handled by reputable processors with encryption.
Pricing.ongoingImprovementsDesc: Your support helps us ship better AI readings and features.
Pricing.howFastStarsAnswer: Instantly after payment. If you don't see them, refresh the stars page.
Pricing.whatIsBonusAnswer: ฿1 always equals 60 stars. Bigger packs include extra bonus stars on top of the base amount.

purchase.title: Purchase Stars

purchase.body: Need stars right now? Choose a plan and get stars added to your balance immediately after checkout. View pricing to compare options.

content.title: Create Content About Us
content.subtitle: Create content. Earn stars.
content.body: Create content about Asking Fate—text, images, or video—and earn stars based on format. Submit a public link; we review within 24–48 hours.
content.note: 💡 Share the public link to your content. We'll review and approve manually within 24-48 hours.

share.title: Share a Reading
share.subtitle: Share a link. Earn up to 3/day.
share.body: Earn +1 star for each unique visitor who opens your shared reading—capped at 3 stars per day. Awards apply automatically.

refer.title: Refer a Friend
refer.subtitle: Invite friends. Earn together.
refer.body: Share your referral link. You and your friend each earn 5 stars (up to 10 friends per week). If 10 friends register within a week, you receive a 10‑star bonus. Stars are granted when invited friends complete registration.
